title: Changing days
creator_credit: Joanne Lisinska and RMIT Media Arts
brief_description:
Thoughtful animated work on modern city life and the desire to escape from the claustrophobic world of the ever encroaching brick walls that confine, alienate and isolate us.
Graduate work from RMIT media arts (BA Arts)
